item.title: Apparel Company VF Corp Puts Focus on Brand Growth
item.description: Bloomberg’s Lisa Abramowicz sits down with Bracken Darrell, president and ceo of VF Corp – the parent company of notable apparel brands such as North Face and Vans, to talk the company’s growth strat
